title: 2 John 1:1
content: 1 The elder, to the chosen lady and her children, whom I love in truth, and not I only, but also all those who know the truth,

title: 2 John 1:2
content: 2 for the truth’s sake, which remains in us, and it will be with us forever:

title: 2 John 1:3
content: 3 Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us, from God the Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

title: 2 John 1:4
content: 4 I rejoice greatly that I have found some of your children walking in truth, even as we have been commanded by the Father.

title: 2 John 1:5
content: 5 Now I beg you, dear lady, not as though I wrote to you a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.

title: 2 John 1:6
content: 6 This is love, that we should walk according to his commandments. This is the commandment, even as you heard from the beginning, that you should walk in it.

title: 2 John 1:7
content: 7 For many deceivers have gone out into the world, those who don’t confess that Jesus Christ came in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the Antichrist.

title: 2 John 1:8
content: 8 Watch yourselves, that we don’t lose the things which we have accomplished, but that we receive a full reward.

title: 2 John 1:9
content: 9 Whoever transgresses and doesn’t remain in the teaching of Christ doesn’t have God. He who remains in the teaching has both the Father and the Son.

title: 2 John 1:10
content: 10 If anyone comes to you and doesn’t bring this teaching, don’t receive him into your house, and don’t welcome him,

title: 2 John 1:11
content: 11 for he who welcomes him participates in his evil deeds.

title: 2 John 1:12
content: 12 Having many things to write to you, I don’t want to do so with paper and ink, but I hope to come to you and to speak face to face, that our joy may be made full.

title: 2 John 1:13
content: 13 The children of your chosen sister greet you. Amen.
